name: Good Girl Blush Eau de Parfum
about: Fragrance Family:Florals.Scent Type:Warm Florals.Key Notes:Mandarin, Ylang-Ylang, Vanilla.Fragrance Description:A fresh, floral explosion of femininity, this radiant reinvention of the iconic Good Girl scent reveals the multifaceted nature of modern womanhood with a double dose of sensual vanilla and exotic ylang-ylang..About the Bottle:This fragrance is housed in a delicate pastel-pink stiletto..About the Fragrance:Inspired by powdery blush, this 100 percent vegan perfume contrasts the sensuality of two different vanilla extracts with the romanticism of a peony heart note. The vanilla and ylang-ylang it contains are each sustainably sourced.
ingredients: Alcohol Denat., Parfum (Fragrance), Aqua (Water), Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene, Benzyl Salicylate, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal, Citral, Alcohol, Tris(Tetramethylhydroxypiperidinol) Citrate, Coumarin, Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Alcohol, Ci 14700 (Red 4), Ci 60730 (Ext. Violet 2).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Fragrance is intensified by the warmth of your own body. Apply in the creases of your knees and elbows for a longer-lasting, stronger scent. .-After applying, avoid rubbing or dabbing skin. This breaks down the fragrance, causing it to wear off more quickly. .-If you prefer placing fragrance on your wrists, be sure to reapply after frequent handwashing, as this tends to rinse off the scent. .-Replace fragrance after 12 months. Expired perfumes more than a year old lose the integrity of the original scent...Eau de Toilette or Eau de Parfum?: .The difference lies in the volume of perfume oil. While EDT contains five to nine percent, EDP contains more, usually eight to 14 percent. EDPs, therefore, last longer and smell more intense.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am so picky about perfumes and I can not stand most of them. I have been on the lookout for my signature scent forever, and I found it in this. This is the first time I bought the full size of any perfume because even the ones I can tolerate I don't like enough to really commit to. Every time I have shared this with a friend they love it and go buy it for themselves immediately. To me, it smells like a bubble bath at the beginning. Specifically like the strawberry bubble bath for kids that came by the gallons we all used but way more subtle and less artificial. When it dries down, it smells a little more gourmand and vanilla. One thing I don't like about a lot of the most famous perfumes is how sharp and overpowering they are. This is soft, feminine, and powdery and the floral is very subtle and bright, not at all grandma-like. Personally, I didn't think it lasted very long as I couldn't smell it after about an hour or two, and this was my only disappointment with the product. However, people always tell me I smell good and ask what I am wearing long after I think the scent has worn off so perhaps you just become nose blind to it. Lastly, this packaging is the cutest I have seen and I love the color. I think it's so fitting that the one perfume I like looks like this!

reviews.review_text: I love Carolina Herrera‚Äôs original fragrance, so I was super excited to try her new fragrance in Blush for free from Influenster in exchange for my honest review! This reinterpretation is definitely more sensual than her most popular Good Girl scent. The top notes of Bergamot and Bitter Almond really shine through when you first spray it. As it develops it starts to reveal a bit of Peony and Ylang-Ylang, and when it settles you can smell the base notes of Vanilla, but not in a sweet way. To me, it definitely gives more of a mature, warm, floral scent. It‚Äôs a very wearable perfume for any age group. My daughter who is in her 20‚Äôs has been stealing it, and my mother who is in her 60‚Äôs also quite enjoys it! I‚Äôve been wearing it to work most days, and while the scent does fade a bit throughout the day I can definitely still smell it at the end of my work day. You can expect it to last at least 7 hours. The iconic Caroline Herrera perfume bottles are gorgeous! The packaging definitely accentuates the luxurious aspect of this perfume experience. The high heel stiletto bottle fades into a light, soft pink color that fits with the name of this perfume perfectly. It is a bit on the pricier side coming in at 175$ Canadian for a 50ml bottle, but it is so worth it! Highly recommend!

reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Influenster in exchange for my honest review.  Carolina Herrera Good Girl Blush Eau de Parfum is the newest addition to the Good Girl fragrance collection from this powerhouse. It comes in the most gorgeous packaging I've ever encountered: a perfectly pink stiletto bottle that's not only beautiful but also a functional addition to any desktop. You could even use it as a phone test just for fun.    The fragrance itself is a romantic take on the original Good Girl scent. It's got a fresh, floral, peony-vanilla combo. The peony is quite clearly the star although the other notes help to elevate everything including a double dose of vanilla, two forms of ylang-ylang and upcycled rosewater. It's delicate and feminine. Plus I find even with the smallest spray that the fragrance lasts hours and isn't overpowering. I absolutely loved it and the amount of compliments I receive while wearing this perfume is unprecedented.   Thanks Influenster for sending me this little gem.   Fragrance Family = Floral Key Notes = Top - bergamot mandarin Middle - ylang ylang Base - vanilla absolute tonka bean

The scent is long lasting and can be overwhelming if overdone. Personally I see it more fit for an evening out or special occasion, as opposed to everyday use, as it is quite powerful. reviews.review_text: I was generously provided Carolina Herrera Good Girl Blush Eau de Parfum in exchange for my honest review from Influenster. First impressions, the bottle is probably one of the coolest looking bottles I've ever seen. The gold stiletto, pastel pink sole, is not only sexy, but it is sophisticated sitting on my dresser. The mixed notes of mandarin, ylang ylang and vanilla bring such warmth reminding me of candy and flowers.If you spray too much, it is quite strong, however once it settles its quite beautiful. I did notice however that the smell on my skin didn't last the entire day, it did last longer on my clothes, but that was ok as many places these days try to remain scent free. reviews.review_title: Great scent if you love sweet, warm florals
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If you love wearing sweet, floral scents this is for you. It's difficult to describe a scent but this quite floral, sweet and effervescent (if that can be a smell). If it were a colour, the pink of the bottle is a perfect depiction. It's hard for me to think back this far but it almost reminds me of a sophisticated exclamation! for those of you in my age group!  It is a nice perfume with a lasting scent. If you like Candy by Prada or Les Belles de Ricci you will love this. That said, this bottle was a gift from Influenster for an honest review so honestly... This would not be a perfume I would choose for myself. The scent profile isn't my preference. Also, I really really don't like the name Good Girl. I feel it's a patronizing and infantilizing term especially for anyone who is out of the girl age bracket. I also think the contrast of the name vs. the stiletto shape of the packaging suggested that the term is being using in a sexualize manner. Wear this wile you're watching or reading 50 Shades. If someone asked what I was wearing, I'd hesitate to truthfully reply because telling someone I'm wearing Good Girl is to me, cringey.  I also think we need to hold these brands and manufacturers accountable for the manufacturing. This bottle has a LOT of plastic parts; plastic parts which are not recyclable. I know so many of you comment on how beautiful some packaging is (and I agree!) but it's wasteful.

reviews.review_text: I received the Good Girl Blush perfume by Carolina Herrera free from Influenster and Carolina Herrera as part of the Good Girl Blush VoxBox.   Despite my allergies and sensitivities, I love perfume, the way a scent can invoke feelings and memories is incredible, so I was thrilled to receive this VoxBox and give this scent a try!  This Good Girl Blush is intended to be a lighter version of the original, featuring notes of bergamot (which I adore), citrus (mandarin orange), peony, ylang-ylang, rose water, vanilla, and tonka bean. I was excited by the notes in this perfume, these notes can be easily identified in the scent when on.   I will say while the bottle looks beautiful and fun, I wasn‚Äôt the biggest fan of the mechanics of it. I‚Äôm a spray the perfume in front of you and walk through the mist kind of person and where the trigger is for the bottle doesn‚Äôt really allow for a simple hold on the bottle, you have to kind of hold it sideways and turned a touch. It still works but it‚Äôs not my favourite bottle design from a functionality standpoint.   The trouble with this was that while this is a lighter version to the original after you spray it on the rest of the house also now smells like the perfume making it difficult to differentiate the scent on me directly. The scent is lovely overall but honestly not my favourite one. I didn‚Äôt have any negative interactions with my body chemistry or my allergies, it‚Äôs just a bit too much of a scent for me, it‚Äôs strong. Now it does dissipate as time goes on but overall I‚Äôm personally just not the biggest fan.   If you enjoy the original then you will likely fully enjoy the Blush as well. If you haven‚Äôt tried it, I would recommend getting a sample first before buying a whole bottle.  So in summary, I am grateful to receive this perfume and give it a try. Good Girl Blush is a lovely scent, it‚Äôs just not my overall favourite in my collection. Would I recommend you give it a try yes, it‚Äôs lovely and may just be your fav!

It won‚Äôt be my everyday scent, but it will be great to have in rotation!

I would definitely recommend if you are not sensitive but would steer clear if you are.

reviews.review_title: What a stunning bottle and lovely scent!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Caroline Herrera Good Girl Blush Eau de Parfum courtesy of Influenster to test in exchange for my honest review. The Good Girl Blush Eau de Parfum comes in a stunning pastel-pink stiletto glass bottle and has a floral scent, both of which exude elegance. The bottle itself is so beautiful, and would look gorgeous on any vanity. The nozzle on the bottle does spray well, and allows for an even spritz.   The notes of the fragrance include mandarin, peony, rose, ylang-ylang and vanilla. The first ingredient on the list is alcohol, and it definitely is very alcohol forward when you first spray it. However, as the alcohol smell dissipates, you're left with a lovely sweet floral scent. It is a very youthful scent, but I think women of all ages can appreciate it. The perfume is supposed to become more intensified with the warmth of your body, and thus, really is meant to be sprayed directly on the skin. I find that when I spray it in the creases of my elbows and behind my ears, the scent lasts all day on me - I have tested it, and it lasts more than 12 hours. However, if I just spritz it on my clothes, the scent fades fairly quickly.

I‚Äôm not exactly sure what peony smells like, but I do get a bit of a chalky floral so I imagine that‚Äôs the peony. I can also smell rose, but it‚Äôs not prominent, more of an accent. Overall I feel like this works best for daytime, and can probably work well in any season. Although it may feel heavy in the hottest days due to the sweetness and the powdery aspect. Definitely smell before buying, liking the other good girls does not necessarily mean you will like this. And if you don‚Äôt like powdery fragrances, chances are pretty low that you will like this. To my nose it‚Äôs very different, and has a weirdness to it that‚Äôs proving addictive.
